parameters.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The number of days for which you can retain the backup data.

parameters.name: PreferredBackupPeriod
parameters.description: The backup cycle, which indicates the day of the week when the system regularly backs up data. Separate multiple dates with commas (`,`).

parameters.name: PreferredBackupTime
parameters.description: The backup time window within which the backup task is performed. The time is displayed in `UTC`. For example, `12:00Z-13:00Z` indicates that the backup time window ranges from `12:00` (UTC) to `13:00` `(UTC)`.
